oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The !au, or shaped rib-bone, used by Bushmen in eating certain food. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6082). The facing page contains a note as to how it is shaped or 'worked'. 1) See also The '|khu' or Bushman soup-spoon, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !au or shaped rib-bone used by Bushmen in eating some kinds of food
